Articles.Content:
Hi!

Everyone knows, what "Economic Boom" Update did added: Destrustible buildings!

But you don't want them to be destroyed with these ugly, bulky 0.625m bombs made out of stock things, don't you?

Ladies and Gentlemans, i present to You: Bombs.

We've just hit 1000 downloads!

Thanks!

Q: How do we use these things?

A: Simple, just take bomb from Utility slot, and place it on bomb binding!

Every bomb has built-in decoupler, so you don't need additional parts!

Q: How do we use rockets?

A: It's more complicated. Take Rocket Binding from Utility tab, and place it on wing.

Then place Your rocket using angle snap (c button).

You can use attach nodes used in Multiple Holders.

I recommend using this add-on with my other mod, WEIGHTS for better airplanes balancing.

I was kinda disappointed. I thought there'd be custom explosions like the pirated weapons for the lazer mod.
Pretty neat looking mod. Any chance of a stackable version for torpedoes? I'd love to mount those on my interplanetary warships.

REMEMBER!

If You have great idea for what i can add to this add-on, post it!
A stackable version for torpedoes?

I was kinda disappointed. I thought there'd be custom explosions like the pirated weapons for the lazer mod.

Remember, this is for .25. And then, we won't need custom explosions because the regular ones look so @#$% amazing.
Congrats on the Modding Monday!
Can we haz better textures?

Ideas for all of your gravity assisted rapid combustion experimenting needs:

* Bombs designed to pack as tightly as possible into SP+ bays and release smoothly.

* Timers to allow SRB-based things to be dropped and then ignited at a chosen later time.

* Timers for bomb detonation to allow airbursts or penetrators.

* Fuel air bombs with little parachutes that hold them while they spray.

* Some way to allow the feed from a bomb-mounted RPM camera to keep displaying in the cockpit until impact.

* Non-destructive droppable things: relief supplies (also with little parachutes), tanks of firefighting foam, navigation beacons, lifeboats, fuel caches, lithobraked science probes, etc.
Let the chaos begins !!!

But first, let me complete creating UNGUIDED ROCKETS (Alpha tests seem potential)
